sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { loginForm!:FormGroup ngOnInit(): void { this.loginForm=new FormGroup({ email:new FormControl(null,[Validators.required,Validators.email]), password:new FormControl(null,[Validators.required,Validators.minLength(8)]) }) } onLogin(){ console.log(this.loginForm); } }
